outline:
1. fat, oil
    1. fat, fatness
    2. oil, olive oil
      1. as staple, medicament or unguent
      2. for anointing
    3. fat (of fruitful land, valleys) (metaph)
kjv_def: anointing, [idiom] fat (things), [idiom] fruitful, oil(-ed), ointment, olive, [phrase] pine.
strongs_def: grease, especially liquid (as from the olive, often perfumed); figuratively, richness
